alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 6:18PM MST until August 22 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST/945 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 615 PM MST /715 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had ended with only a few light showers remaining. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Butterfly Slot Canyon, NMS Beach, Starting Water Wash Slot Canyon, West Canyon Creek Slot Canyon, Labyrinth Canyon, Tower Butte, Cardiac Canyon, Porcupine Canyon, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Lake Powell and Navajo Reservation. This includes the following slot canyons... Butterfly Canyon, West Canyon Creek, Canyon X and Labyrinth Canyon. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Peach Wash, Antelope Creek, Navajo Creek, West Canyon Creek, Last Chance Creek, Kaibito Creek, Sand Wash and Starting Water Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, slot canyons and creeks can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
